meta.title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
meta.author: Sarah J. Maas

1.description: A 19-year-old human huntress struggling to keep her family alive. Skilled with a bow and arrow.

5.description: Brought to the Spring Court as punishment for killing a faerie wolf. Begins to see beauty in the faerie realm.

20.description: Developing feelings for Tamlin. Learning about the curse on the Spring Court.

35.description: At Under the Mountain, facing trials to save Tamlin and the Spring Court.

3.description: A powerful faerie lord with a beast form. Wears a mask that cannot be removed.

20.description: Cursed by Amarantha. In love with Feyre but sending her away for her safety.

34.description: The most powerful High Lord in Prythian. Dark-haired and devastatingly beautiful. Appears to serve Amarantha.

42.description: Secretly helping Feyre during the trials. Not what he seems on the surface.

3.description: Tamlin's emissary and friend. Has russet hair, a scarred face, and a metal eye. Sharp-tongued and witty.

15.description: Son of the Autumn Court. Has a complicated past and lost love.

32.description: A powerful and cruel High Fae who has cursed the Spring Court and rules Under the Mountain.

35.description: Once spurned by Tamlin. Has enslaved all the High Lords of Prythian.

5.description: A bark-skinned faerie who serves as Feyre's lady's maid in the Spring Court. Kind but mysterious.

1.description: Feyre's eldest sister. Beautiful but cold and bitter about their poverty.
Feyre's middle sister. Gentle and loves gardening. Engaged to Graysen.
The Archeron sisters' father. Once wealthy, now crippled and broken.

3.description: The wolf-formed faerie that Feyre killed. A member of Tamlin's court.

8.description: A Spring Court sentry. Large and intimidating.
A Spring Court sentry who works with Bron.

30.description: A High Priestess who visits the Spring Court.

1.description: Feyre's former lover from the village. Son of a wealthy merchant.

12.description: An ancient creature that must answer truthfully when trapped. Skeletal with tattered robes.

20.description: Amarantha's monstrous creature. Has leathery wings and a hideous face.

34.description: High Lord of the Autumn Court. Cruel and allied with Amarantha.
High Lord of the Day Court. Dark-skinned and powerful.
Young High Lord of the Summer Court.
High Lord of the Dawn Court. A healer.
High Lord of the Winter Court. Cold and aloof.

10.description: A dangerous water creature in the Spring Court.

8.description: Shape-shifting faerie creature.

18.description: Serpentine creatures that attack during the summer solstice.

1.description: Nesta's former suitor from their wealthier days.

7.description: Floating lights that lead travelers astray.

1.description: The deceased mother of the Archeron sisters.
A relative of the Archeron family mentioned in passing.

27.description: Elain's fiancé, son of Lord Nolan.

35.description: Ancient human warrior who fought against the Fae. His eye is kept by Amarantha.
Jurian's faerie lover who betrayed him.

recaps.1: Feyre hunts in the winter forest to feed her impoverished family. She encounters and kills a massive wolf.
recaps.2: Feyre sells the wolf pelt at the market. That evening, a beast arrives demanding retribution for the wolf's death.
recaps.3: The beast reveals himself as Tamlin, a faerie High Lord. As punishment for killing a faerie, Feyre must live in the Spring Court.
recaps.4: Feyre arrives at the Spring Court manor and meets Lucien. She learns about the treaty between humans and fae.
recaps.5: Feyre settles into life at the Spring Court, served by Alis. She begins to see the beauty in the faerie realm.
recaps.6: Feyre explores the manor and grounds. Tamlin shows her kindness despite her initial hostility.
recaps.7: Feyre encounters will-o'-wisps in the garden. She and Tamlin begin to understand each other better.
recaps.8: Feyre meets more members of the Spring Court. She learns about the masks they cannot remove.
recaps.9: Feyre goes riding with Lucien and encounters magical creatures in the forest.
recaps.10: A dangerous bogge attacks. Tamlin saves Feyre, showing his protective nature.
recaps.11: Feyre begins painting again, finding solace in art. Her relationship with Tamlin deepens.
recaps.12: Feyre captures a Suriel to learn about the blight affecting the courts.
recaps.13: The Suriel reveals crucial information before Tamlin rescues Feyre from danger.
recaps.14: Feyre and Tamlin grow closer. She starts to feel torn between two worlds.
recaps.15: Lucien's backstory is revealed. Feyre learns more about court politics.
recaps.16: Feyre attends a Spring Court celebration, experiencing faerie culture.
recaps.17: Tensions rise as the threat to the Spring Court becomes more apparent.
recaps.18: The Summer Solstice brings both celebration and danger to the Spring Court.
recaps.19: Feyre and Tamlin's romance blossoms as they spend more time together.
recaps.20: The Attor attacks. Tamlin reveals the curse and sends Feyre back to the mortal realm.
recaps.21: Feyre returns home to find her family's fortune restored by Tamlin's magic.
recaps.22: Feyre struggles to adjust to mortal life while worrying about Tamlin.
recaps.23: Feyre realizes she loves Tamlin and decides to return to help him.
recaps.24: Feyre says goodbye to her family, knowing she may never return.
recaps.25: Feyre travels back to the Spring Court, finding it deserted and in ruins.
recaps.26: Alis appears and explains what happened after Feyre left.
recaps.27: Feyre learns about Amarantha's curse and the trials she must face.
recaps.28: Feyre prepares to go Under the Mountain to save Tamlin.
recaps.29: Feyre enters the dangerous passages leading to Under the Mountain.
recaps.30: Feyre navigates the treacherous path, encountering various creatures.
recaps.31: Feyre reaches the entrance to Amarantha's court Under the Mountain.
recaps.32: Feyre enters Amarantha's throne room and sees the enslaved High Lords.
recaps.33: Amarantha proposes the bargain: three trials or answer a riddle.
recaps.34: Feyre accepts the trials. Rhysand makes a bargain with her for healing.
recaps.35: Feyre faces the first trial: defeating a giant worm in a pit.
recaps.36: Feyre recovers from her injuries. Rhysand calls in their bargain.
recaps.37: Feyre spends time in the Night Court, drugged and humiliated.
recaps.38: The second trial approaches. Feyre must read to survive.
recaps.39: Lucien helps Feyre during the second trial despite the risks.
recaps.40: Feyre prepares for the final trial, knowing it will be the worst.
recaps.41: The third trial: Feyre must kill innocent faeries to save Tamlin.
recaps.42: Feyre completes the trials but Amarantha doesn't free them.
recaps.43: Feyre solves the riddle at the last moment: the answer is love.
recaps.44: The final confrontation with Amarantha reaches its climax as Feyre faces the ultimate consequence of her defiance.
recaps.45: An extraordinary event changes everything. Feyre awakens to find the curse broken and the Spring Court freed.
recaps.46: Feyre and Tamlin return to the Spring Court, both changed by their ordeal Under the Mountain.
